attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and was very unpleased it took up all the storage on my phone and actually made my phone crash. Of course this has never happened with any other app. I actually believe after downloading this app I have been watched through my camera so now I have to get a new phone. I am very infuriated and would definitely NOT recommend this app to anyone!!! and I was very disturbed by the disgusting racist, homophobic, transphobic, sexist, misogynistic, CHILD RAPIST on the screen. I would have rated this app a zero if I could.
